name: Camouflage Rogue
description: Run From Your Counter Part Double as You Blend into The Background and try to attack your AI Before He Does by Pressing the A Key, Switch Level Maps by Running Between the Staircases, Run Through Opening Doors, Find Wall Traps, And Interact by Saying Hello with The E Key, Invisible Dangers That Take Player Lives And destroy Your Characters Ability to Move, Sound Effects and More!!! Pause by Pressing the L Key...To Quit Press Q. Enjoy My First Starter Project.
